The last standing castle of the kingdom is under severe attacks from the enemy. Are you ready to break the high score and challenge the ultimate Castle Defense challenge against opponents from around the world? Can you defend the castle from destruction and wipe out the invading troops?

Castle Defense is an exciting war game for kids and adults. This is a game of strategy. You must defend the castle by shooting the approaching enemy before they reach the end of the road. It is an incredible game with lots of fun. Defend the castle by using different types of towers to shoot the enemy. For the most part it is super easy and pretty simple to play, although the game is not without its confronts. It's not as easy as it seems!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Individual graphics and sound settings
Atmospherically dense level based soundtrack
Dozens of different enemy archetypes in different independent classes
A range of environments including ruins, forests and catacombs
Advanced unit management with a variety of powers at your disposal
Distinct playable characters to lead your army, both equipped with special attacks such as Fire Damage or Ice Bomb
Massive exciting levels
Competitive online high-score hunting in Campaign and Arena modes
